name: divergently

in a way that is different or becoming different from something else: As they grow up, the friends have divergently different attitudes to marriage.
psychology
  specialized If you think divergently, you consider many different possibilities, especially unusual ones, which helps you to think of new ideas or solutions: These exercises are designed to help you solve problems by thinking divergently. Related words
